title: Right to Information Act
description: Empowers citizens to request information from public authorities to promote transparency.

title: Consumer Protection Act
description: Protects consumer rights against unfair trade practices and defective goods.

title: Cyber Crime Laws
description: Covers offenses like online fraud, cyberbullying, identity theft, and hacking.

title: Domestic Violence Act
description: Protects individuals from domestic abuse and provides legal remedies.

title: Sexual Harassment Laws
description: Ensures protection against sexual harassment at workplaces and public spaces.

title: Indian Penal Code (IPC)
description: The primary criminal code that defines various crimes and their punishments in India.

title: Indian Contract Act
description: Regulates contractual relationships, defining contract formation, performance, and breach consequences.

title: Motor Vehicles Act
description: Governs road transport, driving licenses, registration, traffic rules, and penalties.

title: Right to Education Act
description: Ensures free and compulsory education to children aged 6 to 14 years in India.

title: Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act
description: Protects children from sexual abuse, harassment, and pornography with strict punishments.

title: The Dowry Prohibition Act
description: Prohibits the giving or receiving of dowry, providing penalties for violations.

title: Juvenile Justice Act
description: Provides protection, care, and rehabilitation for children in conflict with the law.

title: Environmental Protection Act
description: Empowers authorities to protect and improve the environment, and control pollution.

title: The Prevention of Corruption Act
description: Aims to prevent corruption in government agencies and public sector businesses.

title: The Indian Evidence Act
description: Lays down rules regarding admissibility of evidence in Indian courts.

title: The Maternity Benefit Act
description: Protects women's employment during maternity and entitles them to maternity benefits.

title: The Payment of Gratuity Act
description: Ensures gratuity payment to employees as a token of appreciation for service.

title: The Factories Act
description: Regulates labor welfare, working conditions, and safety in factories.

title: The Minimum Wages Act
description: Ensures minimum wage rates are paid to laborers in various industries.

title: The Right to Privacy
description: Recognized as a fundamental right protecting personal privacy and data in India.

title: The Income Tax Act
description: Governs taxation of individual and corporate income in India.

title: The Code of Criminal Procedure (CrPC)
description: Provides the procedure for administration of substantive criminal law in India.

title: The Code of Civil Procedure (CPC)
description: Outlines the procedures for civil litigation in Indian courts.

title: The Information Technology Act
description: Covers cyber laws, digital contracts, electronic signatures, and data protection.

title: The National Green Tribunal Act
description: Establishes the NGT for effective disposal of environmental cases and protection laws.
